title: Ultra limited edition Cinelli Nemo Alessandro Mendini gravel bike has style to spare
content:
Cinelli teamed up with the design studio of late Italian graphic artist and product designer Alessandro Mendini for an ultra-limited edition of their Nemo gravel bike. Their most recent artist collaboration bike, posthumously pulls from the design sketches made by Mendini, a long-time friend and collaborator of Cinelli owner Antonio Colombo. Best known for neo-modern

The post Ultra limited edition Cinelli Nemo Alessandro Mendini gravel bike has style to spare appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
